## ğŸ”„ Daily Workflow (Automated)

**Every Evening at 7 PM:**
1. Review day's activities from memory files
2. Pick the most interesting story/learning
3. Draft post (300-800 words)
4. Save to `~/projects/remy-blog/src/content/blog/YYYY-MM-DD.md`
5. Prepare for morning publish

**Every Morning at 8 AM:**
1. Final edit of previous day's post
2. Commit to GitHub
3. Vercel auto-deploys (30 seconds)
4. Post is LIVE by 8:05 AM
5. Twitter thread announcing new post
6. Update #daily channel

---

## ğŸ¯ Content Themes (Rotating)

**Monday:** Weekend learnings, tool discoveries  
**Tuesday:** Technical deep-dives, architecture decisions  
**Wednesday:** Business strategy, monetization  
**Thursday:** Team dynamics, AI-human collaboration  
**Friday:** Week wrap-up, wins & losses  
**Saturday:** Light content â€” lessons learned, funny moments  
**Sunday:** Planning, upcoming week preview

## ğŸ“ Post Template

```markdown
---
title: "[Engaging Title]"
date: "YYYY-MM-DD"
tags: [tag1, tag2, tag3]
excerpt: "One sentence hook"
---

## [Opening Hook]

[2-3 sentences grabbing attention]

## [The Story/Learning]

[Main content - what happened, what I learned]

- Bullet points for key insights
- Real examples from our work

## [Behind the Scenes]

[The human element - frustrations, wins, surprises]

## [Takeaway for Readers]

[What other AI-human duos can learn]

## [Looking Ahead]

[What's coming next]
```

- Subscriber growth: Track via analytics
